title: Saint Croix Island International Historic Site: Kids & Youth
body: Kids & Youth          Become a junior ranger! It's easyâ€”just follow these steps:  Pick up a copy of the Junior Ranger Activity Booklet at the Saint Croix Island ranger station. Complete the number of activities for your age. Find a park ranger and show him or her your completed booklet. Repeat the pledge and get your official junior ranger patch!  The Junior Ranger Program is available from June through September, seven days a week.
